title: Abnormal Ping?!?
body: Recently I have been getting some ping spikes. One game I'm perfectly fine at 30 ping and 200-300 fps and the next I'm sitting at 250-300ping at 200-300fps. I double checked my internet and it doesn't seem to be on my side(TWC in Texas). This problem started about 2 weeks ago. Is anyone else having this problem or is there a bad connection to riot servers out there?

replies.body:
Given you are trying to hunt down the exact specific issue as to why your ping is spiking so high, make sure to check out our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)!  This will give you a health check of your connection to our Game Servers as well as give you some troubleshooting steps if it found some issues.

Reply back and let me know if those steps don't seem to help at all!
I have TWC and for a month at certain times of day I will have the same lagspikes. I did call them and they said it's on Riot's end, but Riot Support insists it's TWC, it's very frustrating.
